ISSUE.TITLE: Logs refuse to load for some builds
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The following error message appears in console: ``` Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: Cannot read property 'map' of null at client.getLogs.then (drone-app.html:20975) at <anonymous> ``` Drone 0.8.0-rc.3 on GKE Chrome 60 on OS X Sierra
